entry.title: The President does not have the power to make policies, but can still weigh in on important topics and advise the Prime Minister behind closed doors. Walid for my view on the issue of ferrying migrant workers on lorries. Here‚Äôs my answer. #ngkoksong2023 #
entry.content: The President does not have the power to make policies, but can still weigh in on important topics and advise the Prime Minister behind closed doors. Walid for my view on the issue of ferrying migrant workers on lorries. Here‚Äôs my answer. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Our heartland food spots and markets are part of Singapore‚Äôs treasures! They bring us together to dine and bond. It is good to see these places thriving again post-pandemic. I hope we will do our best to develop and preserve them for our future generation
entry.content: Our heartland food spots and markets are part of Singapore‚Äôs treasures! They bring us together to dine and bond. It is good to see these places thriving again post-pandemic. I hope we will do our best to develop and preserve them for our future generations. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #breakfast #foodie #nostalgia

entry.title: We cannot take good government for granted. To use an analogy from corporate governance, it is not sufficient to have internal audit. We will need an external auditor to ascertain and demonstrate there is good governance. An independent President can play
entry.content: We cannot take good government for granted. To use an analogy from corporate governance, it is not sufficient to have internal audit. We will need an external auditor to ascertain and demonstrate there is good governance. An independent President can play that role to promote strong governance in Singapore. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Through CPF savings, Singaporeans earn a good risk-free interest rate for their retirement. The Government invests our CPF savings alongside its budget surpluses for the future. The President, as the custodian of the reserves, plays an important role in k
entry.content: Through CPF savings, Singaporeans earn a good risk-free interest rate for their retirement. The Government invests our CPF savings alongside its budget surpluses for the future. The President, as the custodian of the reserves, plays an important role in keeping these savings safe. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #finance #adulting #lifehacks

entry.title: In life, despite our best effort, the outcome may not be what we expect or want. But the important thing is to give it your best shot. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture
entry.content: In life, despite our best effort, the outcome may not be what we expect or want. But the important thing is to give it your best shot. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Spent my morning with the hosts of @The Daily KetchupüöÄ üçÖ I got to revive some fond memories as we dug into my past and talked about the future. Glad that they did not hold back on the questions, all while sharing their warm and infectious energy with me.
entry.content: Spent my morning with the hosts of @The Daily KetchupüöÄ üçÖ I got to revive some fond memories as we dug into my past and talked about the future. Glad that they did not hold back on the questions, all while sharing their warm and infectious energy with me. I‚Äôll soon be sharing some of my favourite moments from the show, so keep a look out! üëÄ #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: I was in public service for 45 years. I know how important it is to uphold the integrity of our key appointment holders. It is not just about conforming to the letter of the law. It is also about honouring the spirit of the law! #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforo
entry.content: I was in public service for 45 years. I know how important it is to uphold the integrity of our key appointment holders. It is not just about conforming to the letter of the law. It is also about honouring the spirit of the law! #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: The elected president has the role of safeguarding our 3 treasures. These treasures make Singapore an exceptional country. So it is imperative that the president has the right experience to protect these treasures. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture
entry.content: The elected president has the role of safeguarding our 3 treasures. These treasures make Singapore an exceptional country. So it is imperative that the president has the right experience to protect these treasures. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.content: If there's something I can't do so well... that would be cooking! ü§£ I hand made some pizza the other night which I think was absolutely delicious! Sybil said it was burnt and she was not impressed, but she ate it anyway and even took many photos. I was so happy üòä #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #pizza #dinner #datenight
